summary: A command‑line utility that loads a NeMo‑style manifest describing input and target audio files, optionally runs a preprocessing step to generate processed audio, builds an evaluation dataloader, and computes a set of audio quality metrics (e.g., SDR, ESTOI, PESQ) for an audio‑to‑audio model.
business_intent: Enable researchers and developers to quantitatively assess the performance of audio enhancement or conversion models on custom datasets by automating preprocessing and metric calculation.
